https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/FgI56KqEMMvQQZxcfGjehs1Al3.jpg In America, size matters. The bigger you are, the more power you have, especially in the business world. Anat Baron takes you on a no holds barred exploration of the U.S. beer industry that ultimately reveals the truth behind the label of your favorite beer. Told from an insiderâ€™s perspective, the film goes behind the scenes of the daily battles and all out wars that dominate the industry. Beer Wars
